commit.message: Add the lzma and zstd support to the pkgconfig file
trivial: Fix SPDX License ID in the example spec file
trivial: Bump the required meson version
Use a meson feature for zstd support

Make the LZMA support optional

It turns out xz is an undesirable dep...

Fixes https://github.com/hughsie/libxmlb/issues/159

Update README.md

https://github.com/hughsie/libxmlb/issues/157

If there are more such build options, it would be nice if they were documented as well.
trivial: post release version bump
Release libxmlb 0.3.15
trivial: Fix a theoretical problem in the self tests
trivial: Fix a potential critical warning in the self tests
Sprinkle __attribute__((nonnull)) to give a little more compile-time safety

xb-builder: Release source file handles early

The XbBuilderSource::istream can be a file input stream holding a file handle
to the underlying file. These can be released early, as soon as they are
processed, thus they do not consume opened file handles of the process needed
for other operations. This is achieved by not caching the input stream inside
the XbBuilderSource structure.

This had been reported downstream:
https://bugzilla.redhat.com/show_bug.cgi?id=2244575
Accept text/xml as an alternative to application/xml

commit.message:
Generate and use .def file for clang-cl builds

Clang-cl needs a .def file to export symbols from the built DLL.

This will run through the .map file to extract the symbols that are to be
exported, along with info on which version the symbol was added, and since
which version the symbol was added.

Fix the exported api test on Windows

If we are building with clang-cl, we would probably be building via the cmd.exe
console, which makes the generated libxmlb.map using Windows CR/LF line endings
that breaks the test.  Just make the script that generates libxmlb.map output
LF line endings.

Fix compiling with Visual Studio

'G_DEPRECATED_FOR(...)' must be before the return type on Visual Studio.

Do not inline shared code

Otherwise, the libxmlb DLL will fail to link as 'inline'ed functions will be
considered by clang-cl to be only available its own compilation unit.
trivial: Abort the compile when MSVC is detected
trivial: post release version bump
Release libxmlb 0.3.14

Fix comparing indexed text with integer values

Both are xb_opcode_cmp_val() but it only makes sense to compare `int:int` and
`itx:itx` rather than `itx:int`.
